{{Infobox figure skater |name= Curran Oi |image= Curran Oi.jpg |caption= Oi in 2007 |fullname= Curran Oi |altname= |country= [[United States]] |formercountry= |birth_date= {{Birth date and age|1990|10|19}} |birth_place= [[Boston, Massachusetts]] |hometown= [[Wellesley, Massachusetts]] |residence= |height= {{convert|169|cm|ft|abbr=on}} |coach= [[Mark Mitchell (American figure skater)|Mark Mitchell]],
[[Peter Johansson (figure skater)|Peter Johansson]] |formercoach= |choreographer= [[Jamie Isley]]
[[Mark Mitchell (American figure skater)|Mark Mitchell]] |formerchoreographer= |skating club= [[Skating Club of Boston]] |retired= |combined total= 182.89 |combined date= [[2009 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2009 World Juniors]] |SP score= 69.40 |SP date= [[2009 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2009 World Juniors]] |FS score= 113.49 |FS date= [[2009 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2009 World Juniors]] }} '''Curran Oi''' (born October 19, 1990 in [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[figure skater]]. He is the 2006 US National novice bronze medalist. Oi trains at the [[Skating Club of Boston]] under [[Mark Mitchell (American figure skater)|Mark Mitchell]] and [[Peter Johansson (figure skater)|Peter Johansson]]. He won a silver medal on the [[Junior Grand Prix]] circuit in his first year on it and placed 5th at the 2006 [[Junior Grand Prix Final]]. Oi was selected for the 2008 and 2009 [[U.S. Figure Skating]] Scholastics Honors Team.[http://usfigureskating.org/Story.asp?id=40336 U.S. Figure Skating to Honor 10 Exceptional Scholar Athletes at 2008 U.S. Figure Skating Championships][http://www.usfsa.org/Story.asp?id=42485 U.S. Figure Skating Honors 10 Exceptional Scholar Athletes at 2009 AT&T U.S. Figure Skating Championships] Oi announced that he will not be competing in the 2009-10 season, and will instead focus on his first year studies at [[Massachusetts Institute of Technology]]. [http://web.icenetwork.com/news/article.jsp?ymd=20090502&content_id=64388&vkey=ice_news Oi won't compete in upcoming season] ==Competitive highlights== {| class="wikitable" |- !
